spec_data.Name: perl-Crypt-DSA
spec_data.Description:
Crypt::DSA is an implementation of the DSA (Digital Signature Algorithm)
signature verification system. This package provides DSA signing, signature
verification, and key generation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:49:02 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for DSA signatures and key generation
